root.item:
Remap Portuguese keys\
Remap less than to backslash remap.portuguese_less_than __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SPANISH_LESS_THAN, KeyCode::BACKSLASH
Remap ordinal to less than remap.portuguese_back __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SPANISH_ORDINAL_INDICATOR, KeyCode::SPANISH_LESS_THAN
Remap nav keys remap.portuguese_nav_keys __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::DELETE, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::DELETE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
Remap ALT TAB remap.windows_alt_tab __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
Remap curly brackets remap.portuguese_curly_brackets __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::7, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, KeyCode::8, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::0, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, KeyCode::9, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
